summary: Changes the appearance of Serana, an NPC added by the official add-on Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.xinavro.com/img/nexus_desc.png[/img]
This is a simple mod that will change the facial features of Serana, an NPC added by Dawnguard. [b]The face itself is NOT my creation[/b] - I have copied the face of [color=6ea1c8]Michelle[/color] from the companion mod [color=6ea1c8]Girls of Skyrim[/color] by basskimm.

I haven\'t touched the eyes nor the hairstyle; I did try changing them and after a few test runs I have decided to keep them vanilla since they went better with the character than anything else I could come up with.



[img]http://www.xinavro.com/img/nexus_req.png[/img]
- [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/211720]The Elder Scrolls V: Dawnguard[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038]Girls of Skyrim - Michelle[/url]
You do [i]NOT[/i] need to activate the ESP file. Just the data (meshes & textures) will do.



[img]http://www.xinavro.com/img/nexus_credit.png[/img]
basskimm, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038]Michelle (Girls of Skyrim)[/url]



[img]http://www.xinavro.com/img/nexus_perm.png[/img]
You will need permission from basskimm to edit and redistribute this mod. You do not need my permission to do so. Additional hairstyles and/or eyes will NOT be added, feel free to edit them yourself.
author: XiNAVRO
